results.description: Use rp_css_earnings momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by focusing on a strong single field with high user/alpha counts (rp_css_earnings userCount=510, alphaCount=1293). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector). SUGGESTION3 applied: coverage 0.5 < 0.6 so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4 applied: used high user/alpha count field to capture robust signal. Kept KEEP_IN_MINDs: used 2 operators, 1 datafield. Confidence_level set to 0.65 based on literature that earnings sentiment predicts short-term moves.

Capture trend in investor-relations impact (rp_nip_inverstor with high counts). Applied SUGGESTIONS: 1 single strong field (S4), 3 use ts_backfill for coverage, 2 not applicable. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.7 due to high userCount signaling community usefulness.

Cross-field spread between rp_css_business and rp_css_earnings. SUGGESTION1 applied (multiple fields). SUGGESTION3 applied to both via ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 used by choosing high user fields (rp_css_business userCount=777). SUGGESTION2 not applicable. KEEP_IN_MIND respected (2 fields, 3 operators). Confidence 0.68.

Detect spikes in rp_ess_mna (event sentiment for M&A). SUGGESTION1 single targeted field with good alphaCount. SUGGESTION3 applied via ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied (rp_ess_mna alphaCount high). Confidence 0.62; M&A events are impactful but sparse.

Compare rp_css_price (news about price) vs overall rp_css_business. SUGGESTION1 used two fields, SUGGESTION3 backfilled both, SUGGESTION4 chosen high-count rp_css_business. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.6.

Leverage nws18_ghc_lna (change in analyst recommendation). SUGGESTION4 applied (high user/alpha counts). SUGGESTION3 used ts_backfill. Vector suggestion not applicable. Confidence 0.66 given direct link to ratings changes.

Contrast rp_nip_earnings (impact) with rp_css_earnings (sentiment). SUGGESTION1 applied (two fields). SUGGESTION3 backfilled both. SUGGESTION4 applied by selecting high-count rp_css_earnings. Confidence 0.67.
Long-term average of rp_css_business to find sustained bias. SUGGESTION3 applied via ts_backfill; SUGGESTION4 used rp_css_business high counts. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after extreme revenue sentiment
results.description: Identify extremes in rp_css_revenue then mean-revert via sign. Used SUGGESTION1 single field chosen for decent counts. Applied ts_backfill (S3). SUGGESTION4 used rp_css_revenue with userCount=355. Confidence 0.58 (mean reversion riskier).
Spread between rp_ess_partner and rp_ess_product to detect theme-specific news. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 backfill both. SUGGESTION4: chosen fields with solid alphaCounts. Confidence 0.6.
Apply ts_decay_linear to rp_css_business to emphasize recent news. SUGGESTION3 used ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. KEEP_IN_MIND honored. Confidence 0.66.

Use rp_nip_business (impact projection) scaled by rp_css_business sentiment to find high-impact positive combos. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION3 backfilled both. Confidence 0.69 due to multiplicative signal combining impact and sentiment.

results.idea: Rapid sentiment acceleration on price-target news
results.description: Detect acceleration in rp_css_ptg via ts_delta and normalize. SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION4 used rp_css_ptg counts. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.55 (price-target moves are noisy).
Long-term negative bias in rp_ess_legal indicates risk. Applied ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. SUGGESTION1 single field. Confidence 0.6.
Use ts_kurtosis on rp_css_earnings to detect abnormal sentiment dispersion. SUGGESTION3 applied via backfill. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.52 (higher statistical complexity).

Correlation between nws18_ghc_lna (rating changes) and rp_css_price to find rating-driven price stories. SUGGESTION1 used two fields, SUGGESTION3 backfilled both, SUGGESTION4 used high-count rating field. Confidence 0.7.
Weight rp_css_business by nws18_event_relevance to amplify relevant stories. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION3 backfilled both. SUGGESTION4 used rp_css_business. Confidence 0.68.
Identify extreme rp_ess_insider values and filter via winsorize (reduce outliers). SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.56.
Subtract event sentiment rp_ess_revenue from composite rp_css_revenue to find mixed signals. SUGGESTION1 applied, SUGGESTION3 backfilled both. Confidence 0.63.
Long-term average of rp_nip_ratings to capture sustained negative rating impact. SUGGESTION3 applied; SUGGESTION4 chosen rp_nip_ratings with good counts. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Rapid consensus shift in investor news
results.description: Detect change in rp_nip_inverstor via ts_delta then zscore. SUGGESTION3 used; field chosen for high counts. Confidence 0.66.
Compute ts_std_dev of rp_css_business to capture unstable narratives. SUGGESTION3 applied; SUGGESTION4 used high-count field. Confidence 0.59 (volatility less directional).

results.idea: Partner-news momentum vs product-news mean reversion
results.description: Construct momentum on rp_css_partner and mean reversion on rp_css_product, then combine. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION3 backfilled both. Confidence 0.61.
Use nws18_qcm (high-confidence news sentiment) alone to lower noise. SUGGESTION3 backfilled. SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence 0.62.
rp_css_credit captures credit-related sentiment; use zscore of backfilled series to identify credit risk moves. SUGGESTION3 used. SUGGESTION4 limited counts but applied. Confidence 0.55.
Use nws18_event_similarity_days to favor stories without recent similar events (freshness). SUGGESTION3 backfill applied. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence 0.53 (novelty sometimes predictive).

results.idea: Earnings impact momentum scaled by relevance
results.description: Multiply rp_nip_earnings (impact) by nws18_event_relevance to emphasize relevant earnings. SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION3 backfilled both. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Price-target sentiment divergence from analyst changes
results.description: Spread between rp_css_ptg and nws18_ghc_lna to find mismatches between price-target discussion and analyst changes. SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION3 backfilled. Confidence 0.58.
Long-run mean of rp_css_product to capture persistent product-led stories. SUGGESTION3 used; SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. Confidence 0.6.
Contrast rp_ess_insider and rp_nip_inverstor to detect insider-driven stories not matched by investor impact. SUGGESTION1 applied; backfilled both. Confidence 0.62.
Compute ts_ir on rp_css_earnings to measure consistent signal (mean/std). SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION4 used high-count earnings field. Confidence 0.6.
Winsorize rp_ess_mna to remove extreme noisy spikes then zscore. SUGGESTION3 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND kept simple. Confidence 0.57.
ts_zscore on rp_css_marketing backfilled to detect shifts in marketing narratives. SUGGESTION4 moderate counts. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Revenue sentiment acceleration vs rating changes
results.description: Compare acceleration in rp_css_revenue (ts_delta) with nws18_ghc_lna to find revenue shifts ahead of ratings. SUGGESTION1 applied; both backfilled. Confidence 0.6.
Use rp_ess_technical spikes via ts_arg_max to detect latest peak and signal momentum. SUGGESTION3 applied. SUGGESTION4 lower counts but included. Confidence 0.5.
ts_zscore on rp_nip_inverstor with short lookback to capture recent investor-impact momentum. SUGGESTION3 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Spread rp_ess_legal minus rp_css_credit to find companies with legal risk not reflected in credit sentiment. SUGGESTION1 applied; backfilled both. Confidence 0.58.
ts_arg_min on rp_ess_partner to find when partner sentiment reached multi-day lows (contrarian buy). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Multiply rp_css_earnings by rp_css_business to capture combined strength of earnings with business narrative. SUGGESTION1 applied, backfilled both. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Price-news momentum filtered by event relevance
results.description: Multiply rp_css_price with nws18_event_relevance to emphasize relevant price stories. SUGGESTION3 backfilled both. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after M&A positive spike
results.description: Reverse sign on ts_zscore of rp_ess_mna to capture short-term fade after euphoric spikes. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.52 (fades risky).
ts_corr between rp_css_ptg and rp_css_revenue to detect coordinated analysts' price-target talk with revenue sentiment. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Downweight stale rp_css_business by using days-from-last-change of nws18_event_similarity_days (novelty). SUGGESTION3 backfilled. SUGGESTION2 N/A. Confidence 0.56.
High rp_css_earnings combined with low rp_ess_society (societal mentions) may indicate surprise; subtract to detect mismatches. SUGGESTION1 applied; backfilled both. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Analyst ratings vs composite ratings mismatch
results.description: Subtract rp_css_ratings from rp_nip_ratings to detect impact mismatch between composite sentiment and projection. SUGGESTION1 applied; backfilled both. Confidence 0.61.
ts_zscore on rp_css_technical with winsorize to remove extremes. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.5.
Use rp_css_business averaged short-term to detect market-wide surges. SUGGESTION3 applied; SUGGESTION4 used high-count field. Confidence 0.65.
Apply ts_decay_linear to rp_css_earnings to prefer steady improving stories. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Subtract rp_css_inverstor from rp_ess_insider to detect insider news not matched by investor relations chatter. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Use ts_arg_max on rp_nip_revenue to find recent spikes in projected impact. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Reverse sign of short-term rp_css_earnings zscore to capture mean reversion. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Correlation of rp_nip_mna with rp_ess_partner to find deals with partner narratives. SUGGESTION1 applied; both backfilled. Confidence 0.6.
Long-term mean of rp_css_marketing to detect persistent negative marketing narratives. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Difference between short and long zscores of rp_css_price to detect accelerating price narratives. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Multiply rp_css_earnings by reverse of nws18_event_similarity_days to weight novel earnings stories. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.62.
ts_ir on rp_ess_insider to measure consistency of insider-driven sentiment. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Use ts_arg_min on rp_ess_partner over short window then reverse signal for bounce. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Multiply rp_nip_ratings and rp_nip_inverstor to find doubly impactful rating/investor stories. SUGGESTION1 applied; backfilled both. Confidence 0.68.
ts_std_dev of rp_css_earnings over short horizon to detect unstable earnings narratives. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Multiply rp_css_price by nws18_event_relevance and zscore. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Detect large changes in nws18_ghc_lna using ts_zscore on backfilled values. SUGGESTION3 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Subtract rp_css_business from rp_css_revenue to find companies where revenue talk deviates from general business narrative. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings impact spike vs long-term trend
results.description: Compare short-term rp_nip_earnings zscore with long-term mean to detect bursts. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.63.
Reverse sign of rp_ess_society zscore to play contrarian when society mentions spike. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.5 (noisy).
ts_delta on rp_css_marketing backfilled to capture accelerating marketing narrative. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.53.
Correlation of rp_css_earnings and rp_ess_technical to find earnings supported by technical chatter. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.58.
ts_zscore on rp_nip_price to detect projected price impacts. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Apply tail() to rp_css_earnings to cap near-zero trivial values then zscore. SUGGESTION3 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.56.
Subtract rp_css_ptg from rp_ess_partner to find partner stories not reflected in price-target discourse. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Reverse sign on ts_zscore(ts_mean(rp_css_business short window)) to capture short-term reversion. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Compute ts_ir over two windows (short vs long) by subtracting ratios to find strengthening signals. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Subtract rp_css_business from rp_nip_inverstor to find investor-impact not explained by business sentiment. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Use ts_count_nans on rp_css_earnings to detect sparse reporting days (news gaps) and act when coverage changes. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.48 (coverage-based heuristic).
Multiply nws18_ghc_lna by rp_css_price to find rating changes paired with price chatter. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Compute ts_ir on decay-weighted rp_css_earnings to highlight consistent recent signal. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.64.
Subtract rp_css_product from rp_css_marketing to detect marketing spin without product support. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Correlation between rp_css_earnings and nws18_ghc_lna to find earnings that shift analyst views. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Multiply rp_ess_partner by rp_nip_partner to emphasize partner events with high projected impact. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Subtract rp_css_credit from rp_ess_insider to detect insider issues not shown in credit sentiment. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Earnings sentiment acceleration vs long-term mean
results.description: Short-term ts_delta of rp_css_earnings minus long-term mean to detect acceleration. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.61.
days_from_last_change on nws18_event_relevance to favor fresh repeated narratives. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Short zscore minus long zscore on rp_css_price to detect changing momentum. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.6.
Use rp_css_dividends zscore to find anomalous dividend news sentiment. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.5 (lower counts).

results.idea: Earnings sentiment rank within recent window
results.description: ts_rank of rp_css_earnings to compare recent value to own history (time-series rank). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Multiply rp_css_price by rp_css_ratings to find price talk supported by ratings sentiment. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.64.
ts_arg_max on rp_nip_revenue to find the most recent big projected revenue impact. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Apply ts_scale of rp_css_earnings to normalize into 0-1 (scale operator alternative via ts_scale). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Subtract rp_nip_partner from rp_ess_partner to find narrative without projected impact. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Subtract short zscore of rp_ess_technical from long zscore to find sudden change. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.51.
Multiply rp_css_earnings by rp_nip_price to find earnings likely to materially move price. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Short-window ts_zscore on rp_ess_insider to capture immediate insider-driven moves. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.6.
ts_decay_linear applied to nws18_ghc_lna to emphasize recent rating changes. SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.66.
While GROUP fields unavailable, use relative ts_zscore of rp_css_earnings (cross-sectional normalization via zscore) to mimic peer-gap. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Multiply rp_css_revenue and rp_css_ptg to catch stories with revenue and target alignment. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.62.
ts_count_nans on rp_ess_mna to detect sparse event reporting shifts; use when reporting frequency changes. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.47.
ts_arg_max on rp_css_earnings to detect recent peak sentiment days for momentum continuation. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Add ts_zscores of rp_nip_ratings and rp_nip_inverstor to create a combined impact index. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.69.
Detect spikes in rp_ess_product via ts_zscore and reverse to capture quick fads. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.52.
ts_ir on rp_ess_partner to measure stability of partner narratives. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Price-news short momentum filtered by relevance
results.description: If nws18_event_relevance high, take rp_css_price zscore; else nullify (trade_when). SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied; used trade_when to gate signal. Confidence 0.65.
Winsorize rp_css_earnings then ts_zscore for robust momentum. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Analyst rating surprise scaled by event relevance
results.description: Multiply nws18_ghc_lna by nws18_event_relevance to focus on relevant rating changes. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Use ts_arg_min on short window rp_css_earnings and reverse to buy dips. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Short-term zscore of rp_nip_partner minus long-term mean to detect accelerating partner impact. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Multiply rp_css_earnings by rp_nip_inverstor and zscore to find earnings with investor-impact backing. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.7.
ts_std_dev of rp_css_earnings over medium window to detect narrative dispersion. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Correlation between rp_css_ptg and rp_nip_ratings to find targets driven by rating changes. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Subtract long zscore from short zscore on rp_css_earnings to detect momentum crossovers. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Subtract rp_css_business from rp_css_marketing to surface marketing not backed by business sentiment. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Earnings sentiment scaled by event sentiment confidence
results.description: Multiply rp_css_earnings by rp_css_earnings (redundant) replaced with multiply by rp_css_earnings confidence proxy rp_css_earnings (use same field to emphasize magnitude) â€” instead use winsorize+zscore to keep simple. SUGGESTION2 N/A, SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.6.
Reverse ts_backfill of nws18_event_similarity_days to favor novel M&A stories (use rp_ess_mna as content). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Add rp_css_earnings and rp_css_revenue zscores to find aligned positive narratives. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Correlation between rp_ess_technical and rp_css_price to find technical chatter pushing price narratives. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.55.
